participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Reflective and family-oriented, Emily values responsibility and connection with her loved ones.
participant_1.background: I need to learn to take responsibility for my own actions and stop blaming others. I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older. I'm from Seattle. I am overall happy with life. I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Jordan enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing knowledge with others.
participant_2.background: I work in a library, helping people find information and resources. I ride a bike. Pink is my favorite color. I love to watch TED talks. My inspirations are Alexander McQueen and Coco Chanel.

content.text: It's been good, I'm getting ready to leave work.
Oh ok, where do you work?
I work in a library, helping people find information and resources.
Oh that sounds fun, I always enjoy going to the library.
It's a lot of fun, I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, maybe I'll go for a bike ride or watch some ted talks.
Oh nice, I love watching ted talks.
They're so inspiring, I love learning new things.
I agree, they're always so interesting.
Yeah, I'm always looking for new ones to watch.
Me too, I love finding new topics to learn about.
Yeah, it's so much fun to expand your knowledge.
I agree, I think it's really important to keep learning new things.
Yeah, I think it keeps us young and sharp.
I agree, I love learning new things
